attributes.action: bring to account all MPs who have abused the second homes allowance, and either make them reimburse the taxpayer, or deselect them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MPs who have used the process of "Flipping", used the second homes allowance when living with a relative, or purchased more than 1 television, kitchen, BBQ etc in the course of this parliament to be brought to account and reimburse the taxpayer when common sense suggests abuse of the system. Furthermore to audit all purchases valued at over £100, and where missing, or in the wrong location,reimbursement of the tax payer to take place.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
